Label: epipeptide
Description: D-amino-acid containing RiPPs such as yydF (D78193)

Label: fatty_acid
Description: Fatty acid (loose strictness, likely from primary metabolism)

Label: fungal-RiPP
Description: Fungal RiPP with POP or UstH peptidase types and a modification

Label: halogenated
Description: Halogenase-containing cluster, potentially generating a halogenated product

Label: lanthipeptide class II
Description: Class II lanthipeptides like mutacin II (U40620)

Label: linaridin
Description: Linear arid peptide such as cypemycin (HQ148718) and salinipeptin (MG788286)

Label: lipolanthine
Description: Lanthipeptide class containing N-terminal fatty acids such as MG673929

Label: other
Description: Cluster containing a secondary metabolite-related protein that does not fit into any other category

Label: phosphonate-like
Description: Phosphonate-like (prior to 7.0 this was the phosphonate rule)

Label: prodigiosin
Description: Serratia-type non-traditional PKS prodigiosin biosynthesis pathway

Label: ranthipeptide
Description: Cys-rich peptides (aka. SCIFF: six Cys in fourty-five) like in CP001581:3481278-3502939

Label: RiPP-like
Description: Other unspecified ribosomally synthesised and post-translationally modified peptide product (RiPP)

Label: saccharide
Description: Saccharide (loose strictness, likely from primary metabolism)

Label: thioamitides
Description: Thioamitide RiPPs as found in JOBF01000011

Label: transAT-PKS-like
Description: Trans-AT PKS fragment, with trans-AT domain not found
